Text:
I actually have Taboo #7, the sole fruit of quite a bit of effort some months ago.  Looks like you were a bit more resourceful.

I've never made a torrent, but there's no time like the present to learn, I suppose, so I'll give it a try.  Any non-obvious pitfalls the various online tutorials neglect to mention? 

And, before I forget, it's great to see you back on TPB

Thanks whaletail935.

Ya know, nothing too much to say in the way of advice. If you have any questions about seeding a torrent, or would like to discuss alternate ways to share the file with me so I can seed it, drop me a line at the Suprbay (the Forum link below - I'm LeonardTSpock there, also).

Thank you so much LeonardTSpock for these issues of Taboo.  I was the person who requested them a while ago.  I would love to see more issues of this book if anyone else has them to scan and post.  Thanks again.

Hey jessfranc, you're most welcome. Glad you were still around to grab them. I'll keep looking for these (and like I said, I may purchase the issues I'm missing), but I have no timetable for you. Just keep an eye out and they'll turn up eventually.
